MAIN_MENU.1) VOD Recovery: Recovers M3U8 links based on stream information.
MAIN_MENU.2) Clip Recovery: Recovers all clips from past broadcasts.
MAIN_MENU.3) Download Vod: Downloads a Vod or Highlight from a M3U8 link or Twitch URL.
MAIN_MENU.4) Unmute & Check M3U8 Availability: Check and Removes Unavailable Segments in a M3U8 file.

VOD_MODE_MENU.1) Website Video Recovery: Recovers videos by retrieving stream data from websites.
VOD_MODE_MENU.2) Manual Video Recovery: Recovers videos using manual input of stream information.
VOD_MODE_MENU.3) Bulk VOD Recovery from SullyGnome CSV: Recovers all available videos based on a CSV file of streams exported from SullyGnome.

CLIP_TYPE_MENU.1) Recover All Clips from a VOD: Recovers all clips from a single video.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.2) Find Random Clips from a VOD: Recovers a random set of clips from a single video.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.3) Download Clip from Twitch URL: Downloads clips from a Twitch URL that are still available on Twitch.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.4) Bulk Recover Clips from SullyGnome CS: Recovers all clips based on a CSV file of streams exported from SullyGnome.

CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Website-Based Clip Recovery: Recovers clips by retrieving stream data from websites.
CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Manual Clip Recovery: Recovers clips using manual input of stream information.

BULK_CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Single CSV File: Recovers clips based on a single CSV file.
BULK_CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Multiple CSV Files: Recovers clips based on multiple CSV files.

CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.1) Default Format ([VodID]-offset-[inter: Uses the default naming format for clips. (August 2016 - Present)
CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.2) Alternate Format (vod-[VodID]-offset-: Uses an alternate naming format for clips. (Any period of time HOWEVER it uses the original VodID from Twitch)
CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.3) Legacy Format ([VodID]-index-[interva: Uses a legacy naming format for clips. (May 28th, 2016 - August 2016)

UNMUTE_AND_CHECK_M3U8_MENU.1) Check if M3U8 file has muted segments: Checks if the M3U8 file has muted segments.
UNMUTE_AND_CHECK_M3U8_MENU.2) Unmute & Remove invalid segments: Unmutes the M3U8 file and removes any invalid segments.

DOWNLOAD_TYPE_MENU.3) From Twitch URL: Downloads VODs or Highlights from a Twitch URL (Only if still available on Twitch).

OPTIONS_MENU.1) Set Default Video Format: Sets which video format to use for vods and clips downloaded.
OPTIONS_MENU.2) Set Download Directory: Sets the default location for the downloads.
OPTIONS_MENU.3) Set Default Downloader: Sets the default downloader to use for downloading videos (ffmpeg or yt-dlp).
OPTIONS_MENU.4) Check for Updates: Checks for updates to the application.
OPTIONS_MENU.5) Open settings.json file: Opens the settings.json file in the default text editor.
OPTIONS_MENU.6) Help: Displays an explanation of each menu option

PLAYING_M3U8_FILE.1: Download the video file using option 3 and play it with VLC or another player.
PLAYING_M3U8_FILE.2: Or Copy the M3U8 URL, go to VLC -> Media -> Open Network Stream -> Paste the URL and click play.
